About

I design interfaces for mobile and web.

I enjoy code-based prototyping, motion design, and illustration. When not designing, you can find me hiking or being a foodie.

Before joining Uber, I worked with the Final team while going through Techstars and apprenticed with the good folks at Human Design. In a past life, I was an Account Manager at VB&P.

This site is built with plain HTML, Sass, and Jekyll.

Built with ♥ in 2015.
